content: this legal text explains the progress of a cause involving multiple parties mr bl has been given the right to use a property while mrs bs has been given the ownership of the property the property includes a parking space on the ground floor another property has been assigned to mr bg and ms bs which also includes a parking space on the ground floor the text mentions the presence of a notary and identifies the parties involved it states that mr bl previously acquired an area of land and sold an apartment to mr bg and ms bs the parties have agreed to divide a common courtyard and create two parking spaces and two urban areas the text provides detailed information about the properties and their cadastral data it also mentions the value of the shares and the agreement among the parties the text clarifies the legal status of the properties and ensures ownership availability it also mentions the urban planning certificate and tax implications the parties declare their marital status and agree to share the expenses of the deed equally the text is signed by the parties and the notary
